	The role holder would work closely with the creative and project teams. You will be responsible for producing and editing high-quality 3D graphics designs for various projects.


Job Responsibilities


	Create visually stunning 3D graphics designs with high visual impact for clients and other projects.
	Work to a brief, developing and pitching creative ideas and concepts, and choosing the appropriate designs and media to meet objectives.
	Think creatively and develop new designs, concepts, graphics, and layouts.
	Utilize 3D modelling, mapping, texturing, lighting techniques, etc. to create visual elements.
	Creating illustrations, designs, and other artwork used in marketing materials such as brochures, flyers, and advertisements.
	Establish priorities while handling multiple projects and communicate accurate time estimates for each part of the process.
	You will work closely with our graphics and project teams to help support our clients with creating unique videos and animations for various online platforms.
	Delivering design work on time and within a specified budget/timeframe
	Working collaboratively with creative colleagues, project managers and copy &amp; content writers.

	Minimum of a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree from any recognised institution with at least a Second Class upper (2:1) degree in B.A /HND in Fine Art, Graphic Design or related field.
	Minimum of 1-3 years of relevant work experience.
	Proficient use of 3D design software, mainly Blender, and others such as Autodesk&#39;s 3DS Max, MAXON Cinema 4D, etc
	Work with a wide range of media and graphic design software.

	Experience producing 3D graphics in a professional, post-production environment is preferred.
	Strong project management, time management, and problem-solving skills
	Great communication skills to keep the team up to date on project timelines.
	Highly organised, goal-oriented, and can drive results while multitasking priorities.
	Knowledge of motion graphics and video editing is an added advantage.


Method of Application

3D Graphics Artist Job at Octoplus Marketing Limited




        
    

        
        Octoplus is a Marketing Consulting, Support, Strategy Development and Business Solution company. We are interactive Consultants focused on, Creatively engaging consumer/customer/end-users with memorable experience that impact on brands in our care.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: 3D Graphics Artist

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The role holder would work closely with the creative and project teams. You will be responsible for producing and editing high-quality 3D graphics designs for various projects.


Job Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Create visually stunning 3D graphics designs with high visual impact for clients and other projects.
	Work to a brief, developing and pitching creative ideas and concepts, and choosing the appropriate designs and media to meet objectives.
	Think creatively and develop new designs, concepts, graphics, and layouts.
	Utilize 3D modelling, mapping, texturing, lighting techniques, etc. to create visual elements.
	Creating illustrations, designs, and other artwork used in marketing materials such as brochures, flyers, and advertisements.
	Establish priorities while handling multiple projects and communicate accurate time estimates for each part of the process.
	You will work closely with our graphics and project teams to help support our clients with creating unique videos and animations for various online platforms.
	Delivering design work on time and within a specified budget/timeframe
	Working collaboratively with creative colleagues, project managers and copy & content writers.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree from any recognised institution with at least a Second Class upper (2:1) degree in B.A /HND in Fine Art, Graphic Design or related field.
	Minimum of 1-3 years of relevant work experience.
	Proficient use of 3D design software, mainly Blender, and others such as Autodesk's 3DS Max, MAXON Cinema 4D, etc
	Work with a wide range of media and graphic design software.
	Have an aptitude for art and creativity with relevant experience in digital experience, Animation and illustrations.
	Experience producing 3D graphics in a professional, post-production environment is preferred.
	Strong project management, time management, and problem-solving skills
	Great communication skills to keep the team up to date on project timelines.
	Highly organised, goal-oriented, and can drive results while multitasking priorities.
	Knowledge of motion graphics and video editing is an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@octoplusgroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Digital Marketing Executive Job at DAASA Integrated Systems Limited




        
    

        
        At DAASA Integrated Systems Limited, we’re committed to providing reliable, sustainable, and innovative solutions that transform how you live, work, and connect. Whether you’re looking to power your home, office, factory, warehouse, church, mosque, farm, estate, school, or office, we’re here to help you “Plug in, Power Up” and take control of your energy needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Executive

Job Location: Lekki-Ajah, Lagos
Employment type: Full-time (On-site)
Work Mode: Hybrid (currently remote until office setup in mid-November 2025)

Job Description
     

            
    




	We’re building something special at DAASA, a home for ambitious creatives and result-drive professionals, who love strategy, innovation, and impact.
	If you’re excited by work that challenges your creativity, sharpens your strategy, and delivers results you can see, we’d love to have you on the team.
	You’ll be the creative lead and digital driver, managing campaigns and content that grow our brand visibility, engagement, and revenue.


Responsibilities
What you’ll do:


	Develop and execute marketing campaigns across LinkedIn, IG, TikTok, X, and Facebook
	Create visuals, flyers, video content and editorials that drive awareness
	Build partnerships with banks, real estate firms, and financing companies to expand brand reach
	Track, analyze, and report on campaign performance to drive ROI
	Grow community engagement and convert leads into measurable sales


Requirements
What we’re looking for:


	3–5 years of experience in digital marketing or social media strategy
	Strong storytelling, campaign management, and content creation skills
	Familiarity with Meta Business Suite, Google Analytics, and design tools like Canva or Adobe
	A bias for creativity, innovation, and action
	A passion for sustainability and renewable energy


Remuneration


	Starting Salary: N100,000 gross + call & data allowance
	Performance Bonus: Based on KPIs
	Commission: 5% of revenue generated from social leads (shared with digital marketing & content team)


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@daasa.systems using "Digital Marketing Executive – (Your Name)" as the subject of the email.

Civil Project Engineer Job at Sahara Group




        
    

        
        Sahara Group is a leading international energy and infrastructure conglomerate with operations in over 38 countries across Africa, Middle East, Europe and Asia. Spanning three decades, we have broken ground and challenged stereotypes across the global business landscape. The women and men who make up our organization are our strongest levers for growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Project Engineer

Job Identification: 408
Job Location: Ijora, Lagos
Employment Type: Full Time

Role Accountabilities
     

            
    




	Supervise all assigned projects through Development, Design, Construction, Commissioning and Handover ensuring delivery in accordance with project requirements, specifications, schedule and budget.
	Develop technical specifications for contracts, review technical proposals, processes and manage contractor performance.
	Perform vendor identification, pre-qualification, tender clarifications and technical evaluations.
	Perform Quality Assurance, Quality Control and Audits.
	Review Civil Designs and specifications and supervise execution.
	Makes field visit during the construction phase, and interfaces with contractors around project schedule, interpretation of project document, codes etc. and prepares periodic status report to Line Manager.
	Perform Multidisciplinary roles while liaising with subject matter experts.
	Identify project risks; develop plans to mitigate and manage the risks.
	Identify operational and constructability hazards and ensure efficient designs that mitigate the hazards through HAZOP studies, and constructability reviews, etc.
	Manage the construction process on site ensuring that the work in progress complies with the approved drawings.
	Ensure that the standards and quality meet expectations set out in the contract.
	Planning and programming by drawing up a schedule, taking into consideration specific factors ensuring it is implemented accordingly and ensuring optimal use of available resources.
	Ensure a strong safety culture in the project team and compliance with company HSE standards contractors on-site.
	Ensure timely and effective communication with appropriate stakeholders for changes approved scope, quality, cost and schedule with strict adherence to the Change-Management Procedure.
	Other assigned responsibilities


Minimum Qualification


	University Degree B.sc/B. Tech (Civil Engineering).
	Minimum of 3-5 years of cognate working experience (Post NYSC) in a similar role for a Bulk Storage/Downstream Company.
	Civil engineering reinforced concrete and steel detailed design knowledge and experience.
	Project Management Professional Certification is an added advantage.
	Ability to effectively communicate and interface with all levels of management.


Knowledge / Skills:


	Familiarity with industry and regulatory standards, procedures and practices with the ability to ensure execution of work in a safe and methodological manner.
	Awareness of Planning, Cost Reporting, Estimating and Change Control techniques.
	Experience in contract drafting, negotiation, decision-making skills and LPG construction.
	Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio and Project) and AutoCAD.
	Design ability using software for projects and modelling.
	Schedule analysis using software.
	Ability to apply design codes and standards for all facility design validation processes.
	Proven relationship-building skills with good interpersonal skills.
	Project management abilities with demonstrated full life cycle project engineering experience.
	Proactive team player with a strong sense of initiative.
